description: Run the unit tests to validate the 'exit', 'debugger', and 'ask' command implementations.
instructions: Navigate to the root directory of the project.
Run the unit tests specifically targeting the test_terminal_commands.py file using pytest.
Ensure the test execution completes without errors.
constraints: Must use pytest for running tests.
Tests should be executed from the project root directory.
validation_criteria: All tests defined within tests/unit/test_terminal_commands.py must pass.
The test runner should report 0 failures and 0 errors.
name: validate_initial_commands_implementation
